click.apache.org_user_200903_17 hi hans hans welinux.cl wrote hi i have strange behavior transactions i have system where users must upload document wait aproved how long approval process take manual task problem i open more than one document uploading window press submit once eventually race condition arise two documents get registered breaking business rule playing filter configuration web.xml i changed session scope true magically make things work expected you can only upload one document race condition eliminated i assume you using cayenne what most likely happens session scope your transaction blocks second upload request session level once commits second request processed solves problem introduces another worst sessions now see stale data each session has its own version instances datacontextfilter has autorollback property defaults true which automatically rolls back uncommitted changes datacontext have you set false perhaps you should see stale data you rollback uncommitted changes kind regards bob
click.apache.org_user_200903_18 bob schellink wrote problem i open more than one document uploading window press submit once eventually race condition arise two documents get registered breaking business rule btw seems you want use transaction isolation serialize upload requests case i don't think transactions ideal way solve rather synchronize session object e.g public void processdocument file file context context httpsession session context.getsession concurrent requests queue up here synchronize session validatedocument file above assumes validation done automatic process requires human intervention validation process takes long time you might want think about using asynchronous requests dumping documents queue processed later i'm sure many other ways approach problem well kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_201011_4 4 11 2010 09 45 moritz kammerer wrote hi bob returning always false when bypass_validation active would fix security problem it's little bit strange i think better approach disable bypass_validation mechanism default only enable demand must way run validators nonetheless we can add property form setbypassvalidationallowed which enabled render hiddenfield allow validation bypassed since dynamic dorms bit edge case probably worth disabling feature default once feature enabled though attacker could toggle hiddenfield so safety measure form isvalid could still return false bypass true here's jira ticket https issues.apache.org jira browse clk 726 thanks i'll chew over weekend well kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_200905_10 hi stefan stefan klein wrote i wanted use formtable cayenneform using getdataobject get tomanyrelationship set rowlist formtable getdataobject tries construct dataobject using oidfield which holds primary key well oidfield only holds primary key after proccessed so get column fields formtable get processed needs have it's rows filled befor onprocess i only get row list after onprocess i am using suplied getter should i read value fo_id my own construct dataobject use setdataobject set cleaner better way solve you right you need ensure oidfield contains its value before onprocess order populate formtable you could encapsulate early binding custom cayenneform so oidfield classfield values available before onprocess example public class mycayenneform extends cayenneform public mycayenneform string name super name bind oidfield classfield request parameters oidfield.bindrequestvalue classfield.bindrequestvalue hope helps kind regards bob

www.playframework.org http www.grails.org nothing dangerous yet bad sign i don't have experience either frameworks so cannot really comment however its always good look different technologies what offer both have some cool features i think step back after component frameworks i agree however i don't mind simple action based web frameworks though easy learn use have great performance don't lend themselves create reusable functionality off course one can create custom tag libraries quite low level plumbing usually difficult debug other end spectrum stateful component based web frameworks provide reusable components generally quite sophisticated my biggest gripe stateful frameworks built premise web better place more like desktop i never understood approach because web had great affect user interfaces anything desktop applications better took some lessons from web make uis easy simple intuitive generally takes lot effort make desktop application user friendly web other hand has simplicity ease use built fact very hard make complex application web good thing especially your users anyway here my tongue cheek attempt click hype overview click unique web framework java landscape took best both stateless action based stateful component based frameworks combined provide unique blend simplicity easy use productivity performance click stateless also provides higher level abstraction through pages controls developers have full access servlet api can leverage velocity custom rendering layout control default satisfactory simplicity core framework consists 80 classes half which components complicated abstractions study learn basic understanding servlets html you should up running within day getting up speed quickly important enterprise environments high staff turnover easy use clickservlet page control that's pretty much majority coding done java when stuck use your ide debugger step through code full transparency click source code shipped jar making easy step see what happening behind scenes wasn't enough click has some best documentation examples available it's javadoc probably best business performance click's performance legendary click component based framework handles more requests per second than any request based frameworks we've tested against it's even fully optimized yet need even compare click's performance against stateful frameworks didn't even leave starting blocks time click lapped them third time ok fun really all serious kind regards bob ps don't believe framework hype take frameworks spin suits you use dump pss http click.apache.org_user_200911_13 hi hantsy default click uses velocity implement inheritance so only one path variable available inside template however you could use another variable name implement what you want border.java public class border extends page public string gettemplate return border.htm border.htm parse sidebar template parse template2 sidebar.java public class sidebar extends borderpage public void oninit string path getcontext getpagepath sidebar.class addmodel template2 path complete.java public class complete extends sidebar complete.htm parse path you can also use velocity conditionally parse template2 path etc kind regards bob hantsy bai wrote hi everybody subpage can extends parent page via overriding gettemplate method get all feature parent page how make mutil level inheritance example detail page include header content footer section i want split content tow area sidebar main content so i design detailpage include header footer content page extend detailpage include sidebar completepage extends content page include main content area how implements use panel

displayed borderpage.java component public class borderpage extends basepage public transient menu rootmenu override public void oninit super.oninit rootmenu menu.getrootmenu rootmenu.setaccesscontroller new accesscontroller public boolean hasaccess httpservletrequest request string resource getlogger isdebugenabled getlogger debug set access controller return true add rootmenu page control list note rootmenu removed page ondestroy ensure rootmenu serialized disk addcontrol rootmenu override public void ondestroy remove menu when borderpage serialized disk click.apache.org_user_200911_47 hi hantsy click controls pages localized through respective methods getmessages which loads messages from resourcebundles using java's resourcebundle class its all fairly standard locale picked up from context object you can see steps taken pick locale 1 short click pick request locale unless gets overridden click.xml httpsession so default should just work regards chinese characters displaying you encoding property files correctly i recall java properties files support only 8859 1 encoding one needs run native2ascii against property files them work correctly click templates doesn't have support localization so you cannot have template called my page_ch.htm won't work default you can however implement something like your bordertemplate overriding getpath have look velocity's includetool starting from line 108 which implements feature 2 perhaps we can add future release kind regards bob 1 http incubator.apache.org click docs click api org apache click context.html getlocale 2 http svn.apache.org viewvc velocity tools trunk src main java org apache velocity tools view includetool.java view markup hantsy bai wrote hi click user i found click can detect browser language setting may i miss something i set language list zh cn en us en encoding unicode autodetect chinese my firefox click can detect zh cn message after i set locale attribute zh_cn click.xml can find zh cn message display incorrectly display chinese i set charset utf8 display correctly i use utf8 files my project use utf8 mysql encoding click should auto dectect 2 eg.when i miss my localized message key admin_zh_cn.properties click should find from default locale properties file admin.properties raise exception 3 how localize template page resource files css icons solution like wicket tapetrsy click can determine localized page admin_zh_cn.htm

click.apache.org_user_200812_18 hi muzaffer ozakca muzaffer wrote im still using 1.4.2 moment wondering simple way change logging currently going console i guess setting mode production would remove most all logging messages im curious way send log messages file would i need override clicklogger yes you'll need extend create custom clickservlet which overrides createclicklogger return new logger below example how you could adapt java logging log4j please make note you upgrade 1.5 you'll need remove custom logger switch either new jdklogservice log4jlogservice myclickservlet.java public class myclickservlet extends clickservlet protected clicklogger createclicklogger return new jdkclicklogger jdkclicklogger.java public class jdkclicklogger extends clicklogger private logger logger logger.getlogger jdkclicklogger.class.getname private level level level.info level names private static final string levels trace debug info warn error public jdkclicklogger public void log int levelint string message throwable error level newlevel level.info switch levelint case 0 newlevel level.fine break case 1 newlevel level.info break case 2 newlevel level.info break case 3 newlevel level.warning case 4 newlevel level.severe initloglevels newlevel logger.log level message error tricky bit java logger need init new log level private void initloglevels level newlevel level.equals newlevel return level newlevel logger rootlogger logger.getlogger rootlogger.setlevel level handler handlers rootlogger.gethandlers int i 0 i handlers.length i handlers i setlevel level handlers i setlevel level.off

click.apache.org_user_200812_30 hi marcelo from formtable javadoc when using formtable control its rowlist property must populated before control processed so any submitted data values can applied rowlist objects thus order formtable process field values apply table rows rows must available during onprocess phase only way populate formtable during oninit phase ways around example you could manually invoke formtable onprocess listener after you set formtable rows why do you need populate formtable from listener certain conditions you need check you could check conditions oninit method public void oninit manually process button see clicked mybutton.onprocess mybutton.isclicked specify conditions populate formtable alternatively instead using bulk edit formtable pattern instead look using master detail pattern kind regards bob fri dec 19 2008 12 38 pm marcelo grassi franco melga莽o mgfranco gmail.com wrote hi i resolved problem now i have another formtable.getrowlist empty my submit method formtable populated when user click button i saw examples formtable must populated oninit method how can i can populate formtable when user click button thanks 2008 12 19 marcelo grassi franco melga莽o mgfranco gmail.com hello i have page formtable problem submit button doesn't call method my page here declaration submit constructor page this.tableevolucao.getform add new submit gravar gravar ongravarclick when i click button page reloads method ongravarclick called anyone know what can problem i'm using click 1.5 thanks marcelo grassi www.rumotecnologia.com.br 31 9307 1268 http incubator.apache.org click

javadoc when using formtable control its rowlist property must populated before control processed so any submitted data values can applied rowlist objects thus order formtable process field values apply table rows rows must available during onprocess phase only way populate formtable during oninit phase ways around example you could manually invoke formtable onprocess listener after you set formtable rows why do you need populate formtable from listener certain conditions you need check you could check conditions oninit method public void oninit manually process button see clicked mybutton.onprocess mybutton.isclicked specify conditions populate formtable alternatively instead using bulk edit formtable pattern instead look using master detail pattern kind regards bob fri dec 19 click.apache.org_user_201009_0 i guess question asked few times i haven't seen answer solution click works possible decorate click pages border template.htm vs actual inclusion page border template.htm using parse page velocity macro actual click approach works very well simple templates border template.htm more complex ones hard make maintain hence requirement decorate inject content one framework allows arbitrarily decorate web pages even remote ones sitemesh new sitemesh3 http www.sitemesh.org http www.opensymphony.com sitemesh unfortunately i have idea how use click way click still keeps all it's fantastic functionality decoration like sitemesh does requirement quite common where template needs change e.g case cms blog applications allow customer branding might have strange structure requires several insertion points content from pages e.g left column right column etc e.g edituserpage.java page edit user.htm form adduserbutton form needs go one div border template.htm adduserbutton needs go another div e.g right those divs might separated from another several divs nested contain some more things might table so i can't write edit user.htm something like div id center form div div id left adduserbutton div because would break mess up structure border template.htm should only place layout takes place click allows only one insertion point div where parse page takes place using decoration would possible insert different parts edit user.htm different places border template.htm how any ideas how achieve click would highly appreciated regards andrei

click.apache.org_user_201009_58 practically how most e.g php frameworks use mod_rewrite hide implementation just offer rest like url structure i'm curious reference where restful url structure defined unfortunately i can't find single good source following presentation quite nice http www.slideshare.net wombert designing url schemes rest interfaces especially slide 43 44 interesting list dos don'ts http stackoverflow.com questions 1619152 how create rest urls without verbs 1619677 1619677 from what i can tell click urls restful i guess only restful able don't follow usual rest url pattern extension only mime type less query strings form page.htm param1 value1 values separated slashes page param1 value1 using query strings only filtering shouldn't complicated servletfilter placed just before compression filter make click have type url scheme personally i like having url extensions when i see url without extension my first thought still it's directory click rest based framework put delete read etc i think might great addition somehow would easy user developer just map behavior urls verbs over click application too least over part application nowadays many webapps required expose public api part functionality rest like style adrian

click.apache.org_user_200906_52 hi dipita dipita shah wrote i am trying figure out i can configure two html pages map same java source file yep supported you need manually map templates page click.xml click app charset utf 8 pages package com.mycorp.page page path customer.htm classname customerpage page path customer2 htm classname customerpage pages click app might even work automapping haven't tested so you only need declare following default customer.htm customerpage should mapped automatically click app charset utf 8 pages package com.mycorp.page page path customer2 htm classname customerpage pages click app some limitations when using multiple templates though example you cannot use methods getcontext getpagepath page.class getcontext createpage page.class you do throw exception click doesn't know which template use instead you need use overloaded methods which accepts path argument getcontext getpagepath string template getcontext createpage string template kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_200906_81 warnerjan veldhuis wrote gents where best place modify presence fields form i have tried modify fields overriding form getfieldlist form oninit form onprocess i keep running issues where onlogin actionlistener submit gets fired after all methods i assume your login form stateless page you want check your onlogin method whether force logout couple ways you can try perhaps you already did 1 event methods onget onpost onrender all invoked after actionlistener dispatched so you can override them add forcelogoff checkbox however subsequent request checkbox won't part form when form processed checkbox only added after onprocess event forcelogoff request parameter still present so you can check its available force logoff 2 dynamic pages can difficult work stateless environment because design time some controls your case checkbox part form so how about reversing problem ensuring all dynamic parts part form design time runtime instead adding checkbox you instead remove example you can have boolean page property userloggedon which false default onrender method you can query check whether checkbox should rendered default userloggedon false so you end up removing checkbox however your login fails you can set userloggedon true meaning render when form submits you can check logoff should forced hope helps kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_201005_79 hi tomasz 27 05 2010 04 23 tomasz bandura wrote i'am working form captcha textfield based simply calculation sum numers presented label e.g 3 4 so provided value passed form interrupt form processing show error information currently i use solution captchafield.seterror getmessage error key correct i found field has settextmessage method protected i don't have access from page my questions 1 what reason seterrormessage protected basically minimize public api much possible sure how you would want use seterrormessage internally calls seterror well 2 creation customfield only one solution providing custom validation maybe any way setting dynamics validator pretty much yes design have controls responsible handling request parameters validation rendering so only one concept learn control alternative design would have been extract concepts parsing validation etc own classes increases configuration so instead doublefield field new doublefield one would have field field new field field.setvalidator new doublevalidator which also leads separate language packs validators vs controls etc our projects we normally create new controls override validate method handle custom validation request parsing etc hope helps kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_201005_85 malcolm edgar writes writing code using method chaining its something i have argued against long time its something i would never recommend developers do application code because you can get train wreak anti pattern record i don't think method chaining i had suggested results train wreck anti pattern chain method calls you setting several properties same object anobject.text text width 50 height 50 train wreck anti pattern other hand when you chain methods get information you need digging too deep inside your model becoming vulnerable any changes model along chain employee.getdepartment getmanager getoffice getaddress getzip here you dependent too many different objects just thought i'd set straight because i wouldn't want people think implementing method chaining some click objects would done despite train wreck anti pattern different case indeed bad practice avoided absolutely cheers freddy

click.apache.org_user_200904_2 hi jacob jacob wills wrote problem any controls page use javascript like click calendar's calendarfield don't work since external js files aren't being passed along everything else css transfers just fine jsimports always empty when i tried make use gethtmlimports i found isn't even being called during process so cssimports populated jsimports strange because both variables set processed same time even i try hack around things include js files container's page controls within ajax'ed page still won't work some click controls calendarfield makes use addloadevent function script control.js addloadevent fired when page dom ready which similar jquery's ready function other words component calendarfield can register itself receive callback when dom ready what might happening here ajax call made after page dom ready thus when calendarfield registers itself addloadevent never receives callback because dom ready event fired again workaround you can try add following javascript script snippet your container page typeof click undefined script.append typeof click.domready undefined script.append click.domready.ready true above snippet programmatically set ready variable true so when calendarfield registers itself addloadevent its callback should occur immediately let us know works kind regards bob
click.apache.org_user_200904_3 bob schellink wrote workaround you can try add following javascript script snippet your container page typeof click undefined script.append typeof click.domready undefined script.append click.domready.ready true sorry snippet should typeof click undefined typeof click.domready undefined click.domready.ready true

click.apache.org_user_200904_14 hi sven sven pfeiffer wrote because i don't know user wants enter 1 5 10 100 items i would like add add rows button my page adds 5 rows my formtable currenty i see two ways accomplish 1 adding actionbutton its listener adds 5 empty items formtable option would easiest implement your actionbutton event you create 5 new items your database storage choice however because actionbutton listener fired onprocess event you would already have set table's rowlist so you would need manipulate formtable rowlist actionbutton listener order reflect 5 new rows alternatively you could do redirect same page actionbutton listener which also refresh formtable pickup 5 new rows 2 adding 5 rows using javascript i would prefer solution 2 now i wondering click formtable would recognize more rows table formtable driven its rowlist so won't recognize new rows bind values what you can try add hiddenfield form which tracks how many new rows were added you can use javascript update hiddenfield every time new rows added your page you need check hiddenfield value create amount new items before setting formtable rowlist further you inspect html source code you'll note formtable rows indexed based thus fields row 1 suffixed _0 so you need increment index when adding new rows hope helps kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_200904_41 st.kl gmx.de wrote thanks explanation example code got working i get ognl.nosuchpropertyexception when form.savechanges called i guess it's because like you described cayenneform doesn't know about many relation trying access normal setter queryselect name when form saved save ignore exeption should can i tell cayenneform ignore particular field you could ignore other properties still copied you should your log filled stack traces form.copyto copyfrom maps fields object properties based names so you could either 1 rename field match property e.g queryselect courselist instead queryselect courses 2 override form.copyto copyfrom exclude fields should copied public class mypage extends borderpage private queryselect selectedcourses new queryselect courses public mypage cayenneform form new cayenneform form public void copyto object object retrieve all fields form remove queryselect list fieldlist containerutils.getinputfields fieldlist.remove selectedcourses containerutils.copycontainertoobject object fieldlist public void copyfrom object object retrieve all fields form remove queryselect list fieldlist containerutils.getinputfields fieldlist.remove selectedcourses containerutils.copyobjecttocontainer object fieldlist you can see from 2 above form's copyto copyfrom methods delegates containerutils copying so one can override methods manipulate fields before copying hope helps kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_200904_94 hi warnerjan warnerjan veldhuis wrote i am too i read somewhere docs database access similar operations should done onrender method i guess i never questioned method lesson learned always create your form stuff constructor oninit method correct yes most time you should place expensive operations onrender while creation control best done constructor oninit why practice consider case where you could navigate away from page via redirect public void oninit table t new table t expensive operation below t.setrows selectrowsfromdb public boolean onsave save stuff db setredirect otherpage.class since we're redirecting don't process any further return false oninit above contains potentially expensive operation because selects rows from db since you might redirecting another page via onsave method table never displayed db hit redundant moving call t.setrows selectrowsfromdb onrender method you save yourself database hit you were redirect because onrender won't invoked since onsave returns false thing though you don't redirect forward another page really doesn't matter where you place setrows method formtable your options more limited because formtable rows must filled before onprocess occurs otherwise field button values won't processed actions won't invoked also note you still have access httpservletrequest can inspect certain parameters conditionally render formtable oninit method kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_201010_10 hi roy i assume you ran quickstart use macro.vm produced do you have any roles defined your menu.xml macro.vm uses code like topmenu.isuserinroles topmenu.isuserinchildmenuroles code basically asks menu currently logged user allowed view menu however menu doesn't have any roles method returns false you can customize macro add check topmenu.isuserinroles topmenu.isuserinchildmenuroles topmenu.hasroles change basically says menu role defined show menu well click 2.2.0 you can render menus without macro too just do rootmenu wrt changes.html you can also use fisheye tool view svn activity amongst other things https fisheye6 atlassian.com changelog click max 30 view all asv all i'll update website over weekend change june date click.apache.org_user_201010_27 hi form fields binding performed onprocess method oninit method oninit method used primarily post construction operations provided your use click doesn't do anything special phase most action happens onprocess phase example form control determine whether being targeted request so process all its child controls all form fields have onprocess method called fields generally implement pattern onprocess method where perform data binding validation dispatch event any listeners after onprocess phase has been completed clickservlet fire event's any registered listeners example submit control onclick listener you can think closures fact were inspired delphi's function pointers regards malcolm edgar mon oct 25 2010 11 11 am tom谩s p tapia tomas welinux.cl wrote hi i'm new click i don't know it's ok ifi set value control oninit method onprocess method overrides without form being submited until i understood setvalue executed oninit must honored moreover submission course i'm using click 2.2 regards tom谩s tapia silva software engineer

click.apache.org_user_201001_17 hi dipita warnerjan said easiest way externalize properties click page.properties file you place root your src tree src click page.properties src click page_fr.properties src click page_de.properties click page.properties globally scoped page messages click also supports page specific messages specifying properties file same name same package page src com corp login.java src com corp login.properties src com corp login_fr.properties src com corp login_de.properties properties can also looked up from control specific property files its only rarely needed see following doc how message properties looked up http incubator.apache.org click docs user guide html ch03s04 html also see faq http incubator.apache.org click docs faq.html localization kind regards bob warnerjan veldhuis wrote standard i18n rules apply so you create click page.properties all languages click page_ your country lang code properties so dutch page would click page_nl.properties etc locale used from request you can explicitly set locale context http incubator.apache.org click docs click api org apache click context.html setlocale java.util.locale cheers warnerjan 12 jan 10 22 35 dshah wrote hi i am wondering what would correct way implement internationalization using click thoughts dipita

click.apache.org_user_201001_45 hi all thought i'd solicit some feedback new feature i've been pondering about last couple days enter demand binding ability field bind its request parameter when needed controls bound incoming request parameters during onprocess phase however often times we need know control's value during oninit phase so we can perform conditional logic adding new fields form currently we can either bind field value explicitly using method bindrequestvalue inspect httprequest parameters public void oninit checkbox chk new checkbox chk chk.bindrequestvalue without demand binding we need bind explicitly chk.ischecked form.add new textfield comment idea demand binding fields should bind its incoming request parameter when needed example public void oninit checkbox chk new checkbox chk chk.ischecked form.add new textfield comment what do you think feature useful cause unnecessary confusion kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_200910_3 hi christophe autocompletetextfield based prototype javascript library which clashes jquery you might get two libs work together specifying jquery.noconflict outlined here http docs.jquery.com using_jquery_with_other_libraries however its probably good idea mix different js libraries your application so instead you can create autocompletetextfield based jquery http bassistance.de jquery plugins jquery plugin autocomplete hope helps bob easydoor95 wrote hi js conflict between autocompletetextfield cluetip plugin jquery when i put jquery cluetip call page which contains autocompletetextfield jquery cluetip window doesn't appear why

click.apache.org_user_200910_10 hi idea behind hibernateform automate some common functionality validation case hibernateform automatically set field readonly value based whether database column allow null value i guess hibernateform overriding value you set explicitly perhaps hibernateform should only set field readonly flag value false kind regards bob c bryu hitachijoho.com wrote hello list when i use hibernateform i find something correct eg textfield name new textfield name name true required flag doesn't work form.isvalid don't validate bug

newroles roles.add role i added following lines my testcase mockprincipal principal new mockprincipal admin principal.setroles admin user container.setrequest new authenticatedmockrequest principal annotation transactional its spring construct which means i recall invoking any method repository create new transaction before method starts commit transaction before method returns depending how you configured your spring.xml might mean session entitymanager closed when transaction committed how do you configure spring create transactions entitymanager can you post here you might want look openentitymanagerinviewfilter which opens entitymanager when request arrives keeps open until request finishes thus entitymanager open your view lazy initialization won't occur alternatively you need click.apache.org_user_200910_28 bob you right about enitymanger being closed i spent quite bit time looking error spring forums say listener org.springframework.web.context.contextloaderlistener should work same way either way i get same error whether i use listener open view filter contextloaderlistener spring's bootstrap mechanism web applications other words when web application starts up contextloaderlistener read your spring.xml file create spring applicationcontext won't open close entitymanager commit transactions so i'm fairly confident contextloaderlistener where issue lies i still think problem lies fact you have transactional annotation your repository btw i'm saying having transaction repository wrong its just means transaction commit whenever method repository invoked session get closed you want use transactional your repository you basically need know which entities load eagerly i suggest you try following see what happens declare openentitymanagerinviewfilter your web.xml filter binds entitymanager instance thread duration request however even you have filter transactional annotation still commit transaction close session after any repository method invoked so try remove transactional annotation from repository see what happens do you still get lazy exception very likely something else break least should prove theory transactional let us know your findings kind regards bob btw thanks any assistance click error handleexception org.hibernate.lazyinitializationexception failed lazily initialize collection role au.org.pheno.f1 spring.xml bob schellink wrote bob you right about enitymanger being closed i spent quite bit time looking error spring forums say listener org.springframework.web.context.contextloaderlistener should work same way either way i get same error whether i use listener open view filter contextloaderlistener spring's bootstrap mechanism web applications other words when web application starts up contextloaderlistener read your spring.xml file create spring applicationcontext won't open close entitymanager commit transactions so i'm fairly confident contextloaderlistener where issue lies i still think problem lies fact you have transactional annotation your repository btw i'm saying having transaction repository wrong its just means transaction commit whenever method repository invoked session get closed you want use transactional your repository you basically need know which entities load eagerly i suggest you try following see what happens declare openentitymanagerinviewfilter your web.xml filter binds entitymanager instance thread duration request however even you have filter transactional annotation still commit transaction close session after any repository method invoked so try remove transactional annotation from repository see what happens do you still get lazy exception very likely something else break least should prove theory transactional let us know click.apache.org_user_200910_43 hi warnerjan seems bit odd first makes sense only values one can select 0,1,2,3 need set select required since select always have value however select set required should nonselected value user choose from select value empty string so normally one would use option.empty_option select select new select select.setrequired true select.add option.empty_option select.add you want display value nonselected value do select select new select select.setrequired true select.add new option please select value select.add new option m male select.add new option f female see select javadoc more examples required property kind regards bob warnerjan veldhuis wrote hi i have set values 0 3 which i put select which set required validate fails value zero says i must select value how it's supposed work cheers warnerjan

dependency you could recode without overview custom actionresult child used trigger dom event any given type one more target elements bound event type custom behavior which causes custom js executed whenever event heard so your case your initial ajax request would result simple event trigger all other panels forms would listen when heard would each send out own ajax requests retrieve new content click.apache.org_user_201008_14 hi i'm pretty happy what i've seen click framework so far it's actually only java framework i've yet found i've used evaluated most them comes close doing things logical sensible way according my sense logic sensibility one strange design decision i don't understand however why ordinary components can't also use same elegant auto mapping java htm files page classes use i assume i must missing overlooking something so maybe someone can clarify section 3.7 user guide presents what me two rather unsatisfactory approaches custom rendering form says you can either create custom template entire page which form used meaning form's presentation can't reused elsewhere else you can programmatically embed display code form subclass itself which throws away all nice benefits dedicated view template why only pages can auto mapped view templates why can't individual components also auto map even manually map own template so you can reuse them anywhere without having redefine display example you could define class myemployeeform extends form have template called my employee form.component.htm which controls its display way you can include anywhere page template simple myemployeeform syntax seems so straightforward i assume i must have misunderstood something probably already possible can someone point way thanks

hi dian i use spring security click works quit simpel implement spring security libs you project add folowing configuration your web.xml servlet context listeners listener listener class org.springframework.web.context.contextloaderlistener listener class listener context parameters context param param name contextconfiglocation param name param value classpath:application context.xml param value context param filter filter name springsecurityfilterchain filter name filter class org.springframework.web.filter.delegatingfilterproxy filter class filter filter mapping filter name springsecurityfilterchain filter name url pattern url pattern filter mapping add folowing your application context provided you implement datasource your project you can also done spring using hibernate persistance layer security:http auto config true access denied page denied.htm security:intercept url pattern some_path access role_administrator security:intercept url pattern access is_authenticated_anonymously security:form login login page logon.htm authentication failure url logon.htm login_error 1 security:http security:authentication provider security:jdbc user service data source ref datasource authorities username query select username authority from authority where username users username query select username password active from users where username security:authentication provider create 2 table's authority usernae authority make sure user has role_administrator something like default has start role_ users username password active your login page public class logonpage extends templatepage public form form new form public logonpage settitle loging page form.setactionurl j_spring_security_check form.setmethod post form.setjavascriptvalidation true textfield username new textfield j_username username.setrequired true username.setfocus true username.setlabel gebruikersnaam form.add username passwordfield password new passwordfield j_password password.setrequired true password.setlabel wachtwoord form.add password form.add new nextbutton ok logon onokclicked override public void oninit super.oninit getparameter login_error null getparameter login_error equals 1 msg fout bij aanmelden that's all works much easier than j2ee implementation suc6 kind regards bert heikamp 2009 1 6 dian ruzda dianruz gmail.com click.apache.org_user_200907_7 hi garth garth dahlstrom wrote i'm new click i have some questions i get 1 way prevent auto binding fields i.e template project public string title some text which someone can pass title something bad my page when i don't want you can define field private protected click won't bind you can also globally switch off autobinding click.xml autobinding false 2 can anyone point me example page redirects itself adding getrequestparameter it's own url before rendering i tried do getcontext getrequestparameter app null getcontext setrequestattribute app default setforward redirect self without rendering my oninit method doesn't bounce just spins inside my tomcat server also tried setredirect i'm likely doing right ah request parameter request attributes doesn't affect each other further request parameters immutable cannot changed instead check request attribute presence app attribute getcontext getrequestattribute app null should break recursive call click 2.1.0 support passing parameters redirect map params new hashmap params.put app default setredirect params kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_200907_10 warnerjan veldhuis wrote gents i wondering what would best place generating html can either velocity templates overriding control render htmlstringbuffer control gettag methods what do you normally do i don't think hard fast rule here both approaches have pros cons sticking java render allows you use debugger step through code java also more powerful language expose extension points template pattern example you could have method createlabel invoked from your render method which subclasses can override create different label one problem java though multiline strings interpolation isn't supported while templates engines do support so specifying html template normally easier read understand example i have userlist extending panel which shows list users from my system html just simple div containing title div ul li users so velocity template foreach should i go create custom controls generate html fly sounds like template would easiest begin you can always refactor later you need more flexibility kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_200907_17 garth dahlstrom wrote hmm going private protected fields must added model via addmodel annotation do yes you can add model starting 2.1.0 option using bindable annotation however backward compatibility click defaults using public fields you can change passing annotation autobinding property pages package org.apache.click.examples.page autobinding annotation you can specify your fields bindable public string xyz note field still declared public however only those bindable annotations considered bindable quite new click plans expand its functionality finer grained control you can view details here http cwiki.apache.org confluence display click java 5 support currently documentation bindable lacking bit too when i try use getcontext getrequestattribute app always return null which causes go redirect loop strange following works me public class forwardpage extends page public void oninit getcontext getrequestattribute app null getcontext setrequestattribute app default setforward redirect self without rendering first time page hit sets attribute forwards itself you already know just ignore otherwise forward click same forward servlets other words same request used forwarded page which why check getrequestattribute should work however doing redirect means http 304 returned browser which initiates another separate request server since brand new request app request attribute isn't present anymore since you're using 2.1.0 easiest option redirect probably code you used your original request public redirectpage extends page public void oninit note we check against incoming request parameter request attribute getcontext getrequestparameter app null map map new hashmap map.put app default setredirect redirectpage.class map redirect self without rendering i worked around code below autobinding 2.1.0rc1 tomcat 6 redirect context page context page app default before refreshing rendering page public class mypage extends borderpage public string app null public void oninit app null app.trim length 0 getcontext getsession getattribute app null map params new hashmap params.put app default setredirect this.getclass params return else app null getcontext getsession setattribute app app app string getcontext getsession getattribute app hopefully helpful others you're approach above certainly work too means one store state users session hope helps kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_200907_48 hi bala balachandra maddina wrote hi when i going through examples i noticed control.js extras control.js being added ui i dont think script minified does affect performance anyway its okay have click does minify scripts runtime thats what you mean minified script can save bit bandwidth though example running control.js through jsmin saves up 40 so control.js shrinks from 10kb 6kb however you use performancefilter javascript css files gzipped far future expiry header set so cached browser only downloaded once answer your original question bit hard because depends how much traffic site have average site i would say yes affects bandwidth i don't think you need worry about especially click fronted performancefilter btw i believe bigger performance gain had minifying scripts rather combining scripts one since browsers default only make two connections time more resources downloaded slower site loads you already using i suggest you look yslow its quite useful tool grade your site performance kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_200811_11 hi alvin alvin townsend wrote click column ascending light.gif click column descending light.gif can i override just those two images do i have include all stuff click directory when deployed yes you can override only those two you can create your own click directory web application root directory host your own copy images myapp web click column ascending light.gif click won't replace existing resources even better yet better way override them alternative would create custom table override gethtmlimports case seems like more work than simply keeping your own copy two images kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_200901_7 rodrigo antunes wrote i'm doing basically what i saw example method onrender my click page i'm creating autocompletetextfield object same way example autocompletetextfield invokes method getautocompletelist during onprocess phase onrender phase occurs after onprocess phase thus autocompletetextfield created too late execution cycle fix simply create your field either page constructor oninit phase you can read some docs about click's execution cycle here http incubator.apache.org click docs pages.html page execution does solve you kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_200901_10 hi alvin alvin townsend wrote my click 1.5 app i have centralized navigation template page class some links actionlinks which do stuff like cleanup state forward problem i'm having user given page click link same page navigation looks like forwarded ad infinitum same page until click craps out any way avoid without dropping use actionlinks you forward from pagea pagea you'll need add guard against infinite forwards i assume your forward logic page onget method one way resolve register listeners actionlinks add forward logic listener instead onget way click handles forwarding page click forwarding processed other words click does execute onprocess phase forwarded page you can take advantage fact moving your forward logic listener which won't invoked second time forwarded page however you would have register listeners every actionlink alternative which probably easier add guard logic your onget method public void onget context context getcontext context.getrequestattribute forwardguard null context.setrequestattribute forwardguard boolean.true setforward gettarget here you register request attribute guard against execution forward second time does help kind regards bob

click.apache.org_user_200901_29 hi tim menu.css packaged inside click extras.jar under folder src net sf click extras control when examples deployed menu.css copied webapp folder click you want customize menu.css create directory click your webapp folder add menu.css click does overwrite existing resources when deploys so your menu.css effectively overrides click's own menu.css hope helps kind regards bob tim hooper wrote where css defines menu styles menu control i have read old posts reference menu.css i don't see anywhere examples click 1.5

click.apache.org_user_200901_35 default your page stateless hence your selections lost you navigate table first time you need either use stateful page setstateful true page constructor do some footwork url parameters continue use stateless page you need pass choices made your lists url parameters back page when you set district when you navigate table i'd use client side library jquery capture values select objects append values previous next table navigation urls when back page you must use those values re configure your lists state district schools sounds like lot work go stateful click.apache.org_user_201002_60 formtable can tricky thing remember formtable uses flyweight pattern columns thus only single field created per column reused each row tricky bit fieldcolumn rendertabledatacontent method called each row table you'll note method appends row index field name before processed what i think happens row 1 processed setting field name field_0 field processed which sets its value request parameter field_0 validation fails error set field's title attribute row 2 processed setting same field name field_1 field processing setting its value request parameter field_1 validation succeeds error message set null doesn't help do you have small example i can look kind regards bob 16 02 2010 12 49 am warnerjan veldhuis wrote i am having trouble formtable fieldcolumn validation fields formtable.onprocess calls field.onprocess which turn calls field.validate i can see error being present all time after has been set soon field.onprocess ends return value ignored btw formtable continues calling field.isvalid method checks field.error null my big surprise value indeed null while seconds ago i have seen message get set error member so i am quite puzzled here why does formtable validate like should cheers warnerjan

click.apache.org_user_200912_6 hi dipita click 1.5 aren't any ajax specific components except autocompletefield you can use ajax click simply invoke target page stream back result you need you probably want look method context rendertemplate so you can render different templates depending request parameter you can create specific pages handle ajax requests since i'm sure what problems you having here some things look when working ajax ajax calls can use different content types eg html json xml so depending what you stream back browser you probably want override page getcontenttype specify correct type public string getcontenttype return text json charset utf 8 you want render partial results have default page template invoked you have set page path null have look method export example here 1 click examples ship couple ajax examples you can look especially ajax select demo also project underway add ajax components targets click 2.1.0 btw you using javascript library kind regards bob 1 http www.avoka.com click examples source viewer.htm filename web inf classes org apache click examples page general excelexportpage.java dshah wrote we using apache click our webapp need incorporate way dynamically load partial forms based user's selection does anyone know how we can do click support ajax click 1.5 so can someone please point me some examples documentation any help appreciated i am struggling get any ajax work click thank you someone please read respond really appreciate dipita

result you need you probably want look method context rendertemplate so you can render different templates depending request parameter you can create specific pages handle ajax requests since i'm sure click.apache.org_user_200912_8 depending your time constraints since your new ajax click you want reconsider using ajax your use cases example you could use wizard style approach present user different options each step wizard navigates next page which reacts values from previous page otherwise i highly recommend you use js library prototype jquery mootools etc provide good ajax functionality generally shield you from different browser quirks one issue you most likely face click stateless default statelessness has great benefits some use cases your case might work very well your case you add fields form over multiple ajax requests form representation browser very different from form representation server thus when you finally submit form fields added ajax won't have corresponding field server form values won't bound remedy you probably want switch stateful pages however simple flip switch setting stateless vs stateful take different approaches stateful mode page constructor only called once life cycle events called every request while stateless pages recreated every request so start i suggest you pick js library create new stateful page test against page get things working feel free post your code list i'll help where i can one note about clickclick's ajaxadapter you won't have change much your code use ajaxadapter since supports both ajax non ajax calls so your code looks like public class mypage extends page public void oninit submit submit new submit submit onsubmitclick public boolean onsubmitclick dostuff return true change public class mypage extends page public void oninit submit submit new submit submit submit.setactionlistener new ajaxadapter method replaces onsubmitclick above called non ajax requests public boolean onaction control control dostuff return true method optional only called ajax requests which target submit button public partial onajaxaction control control kind regards bob dshah wrote i looking clickclick examples looks like order use we'd have rewrite all our current code base support ajaxadapter etc i hoping use our current code base which uses click 1.5 simply do what we want which calling servlet get partial form our current code base configures form objects using click controls server side renders browser very minimal javascript validation selection done through raw javascript libraries so my idea continue using raw libraries do what we doing also use some ajax library like jquery prototype we particular what we use render part form partial form dependendant child selection based user's selection parent selection needs connect hooked user's selection dependant would change based parent's selection any tips appreciated thanks again dipita bob schellink 2 wrote hi dipita click 1.5 aren't any ajax specific components except autocompletefield you can use ajax click simply invoke target page stream back result you need you probably want look method context rendertemplate so you can render different templates depending request parameter you can create specific pages handle ajax requests since i'm sure what problems you having here some things look when working ajax ajax calls can use different content types eg html json xml so depending what you stream back browser you probably want override page getcontenttype specify correct type public string getcontenttype return text json charset utf 8 you want render partial results have default page template invoked you have set page path null have look method export example here 1 click examples ship couple ajax examples you can look especially ajax select demo also project underway add ajax components targets click 2.1.0 btw you using javascript library kind regards bob 1 http www.avoka.com click examples source which reacts values from previous page otherwise i highly recommend you use js library prototype jquery mootools etc provide good ajax functionality generally shield you from different browser quirks one issue you most likely face click stateless default statelessness has great benefits some use cases your case might work very well your case you add fields form over multiple ajax requests form representation browser very different from form representation server thus when you finally submit form fields added ajax won't have corresponding field server form values won't bound remedy you probably want switch stateful pages however simple flip switch setting stateless vs stateful take different approaches stateful mode page constructor only called once life cycle events called every request while stateless pages recreated every request so start i suggest you pick js library create new stateful page test against page get things working feel free post your code list i'll help where previous page otherwise i highly recommend you use js library prototype jquery mootools etc provide good ajax functionality generally shield you from different browser quirks one issue you most likely face click stateless default statelessness has great benefits some use cases your case might work very well your case you add fields form over multiple ajax requests form representation browser very different from form representation server thus when you finally submit form fields added ajax won't have corresponding field server form values won't bound remedy you probably want switch stateful pages however simple flip switch setting stateless vs stateful take different approaches stateful mode page constructor only called once life cycle events called every request while stateless pages recreated every request so start i suggest you pick js library create new stateful page test against page get things working feel free post your code list i'll help where i can one note about corresponding field server form values won't bound remedy you probably want switch stateful pages however simple flip switch setting stateless vs stateful take different approaches stateful mode page constructor only called once life cycle events called every request while stateless pages recreated every request so start i suggest you pick js library create new stateful page test against page get control ajax aware select subclass technically ajax logic encapsulated within jqhelper class jqselect merely delegates jqhelper hope helps kind regards bob bob schellink wrote depending your time constraints since your new ajax click you want reconsider using ajax your use cases example you could use wizard style approach present user different options each step wizard navigates next page which reacts values from previous page otherwise i highly recommend you use js library prototype jquery mootools etc provide good ajax functionality generally shield you from different browser quirks one issue you most likely face click stateless default statelessness has great benefits some use cases your case might work very well your case you add fields form over multiple ajax requests form representation browser very different from form representation server thus when you finally submit form fields added ajax won't have corresponding field server form values won't bound remedy you probably want switch stateful pages however simple flip switch setting stateless vs stateful take different approaches stateful mode page constructor only called once life cycle events called every request while stateless pages recreated every request so start i suggest you pick js library create new stateful page test against page get things working feel free post your code list i'll help where i can one note about clickclick's ajaxadapter you won't have change much your code use ajaxadapter since supports both ajax non ajax calls so your code looks like public class mypage extends page submit submit.setactionlistener new ajaxadapter method replaces onsubmitclick above called non ajax requests public boolean onaction control control dostuff return true method optional only called kind regards bob bob schellink wrote depending your time constraints since your new ajax click you want reconsider using ajax your use cases example you could use wizard style approach present user different options each step wizard navigates next page which reacts values from previous page otherwise i highly recommend you use js library prototype jquery mootools etc provide good ajax functionality generally shield you from different browser quirks one issue you most likely face click stateless default statelessness has great benefits some use cases your case might work very well your case you add fields form over multiple ajax requests form representation browser very different from form representation server thus when you finally submit form fields added ajax won't have corresponding field server form values won't bound remedy you probably want switch stateful pages however simple flip switch setting stateless vs stateful take different approaches stateful mode page constructor only called once life cycle events called every request while stateless pages recreated every request so start i suggest you pick js library create new stateful page test against page get things working feel free post your code list i'll help where i can one note about clickclick's ajaxadapter you won't have change much your code use ajaxadapter since supports both ajax non ajax calls so your code looks like public class mypage extends page public void oninit submit submit new submit submit onsubmitclick public boolean onsubmitclick dostuff return true change public class mypage extends page public void oninit submit submit new submit submit submit.setactionlistener new ajaxadapter method replaces onsubmitclick above called non ajax requests public boolean onaction control click.apache.org_user_201003_49 hi mykhaylo click 2.0.1 earlier autobinding supported only public fields 2.1.0 bindable annotation added can bind protected private variables well backwards compatibility click uses old autobinding method which doesn't support protected private variables more details see http click.apache.org docs user guide htmlsingle click book.html application autobinding http click.apache.org docs user guide htmlsingle click book.html application autobinding annotation kind regards bob 15 03 2010 03 39 am mykhaylo kotsur wrote hi section 1.2 contains example where protected variables auto binded well http click.apache.org docs user guide htmlsingle click book.html control listener type 1 seems like mistake manual mykhailo fri mar 5 2010 12 09 am gilberto c andrade gilbertoca gmail.com mailto:gilbertoca gmail.com wrote i found problem my mistake i used protected my attributes instead public click user guide 4.2.3.3 section says you can use only public fields so sorry bothering you thanks you attention gilberto wed mar 3 2010 10 50 am gilberto c andrade gilbertoca gmail.com mailto:gilbertoca gmail.com wrote hi bob sorry delay please can you try attached project maven click project just unzip open netbeans i'm using 6.8 version ctrl f6 actiondemotest.java file cmd mvn jetty:run see problem thu feb 25 2010 6 25 pm bob schellink sabob1 gmail.com mailto:sabob1 gmail.com wrote hi gilberto just tested against click examples works me can you double check your i think several examples click examples setup use bindable interface so you can't problem thanks gilberto click.xml file updated your war file perhaps do clean redeploy regards bob 26 02 2010 01 57 am gilberto c andrade wrote hi my click.xml file xml version 1.0 encoding utf 8 click app pages package park.web.page autobinding true mode value debug click app doesn't matter click.xml has autobinding true does work autobinding annotation i'm using any idea how setup correctly thanks gilberto

click.apache.org_user_201003_62 hi john you can use sessionfilter 1 create thread local sessioncontext 2 each request sessioncontext automatically configured via hibernate.cfg.xml file classpath i haven't used hibernate while so sure you can configure naming strategy hibernate.cfg.xml through system properties you can implement your own sessioncontext subclass custom configuration example public class mysessioncontext extends sessioncontext public configuration createconfiguration configuration config new configuration config.setnamingstrategy return config setup custom context filter public class mysessionfilter extends sessionfilter public void init filterconfig filterconfig throws servletexception mysessioncontext context new mysessioncontext context.oninit filterconfig.getservletcontext its worth noting hibernateform uses sessioncontext lookup its session sessionfactory so you don't need use click's sessionfilter sessioncontext use hibernateform however you need override hibernateform methods getsession getsessionfactory lookup objects when using alternative session creation strategy hope helps kind regards bob 1 http click.apache.org docs extras api org apache click extras hibernate sessionfilter.html 2 http click.apache.org docs extras api org apache click extras hibernate sessioncontext.html 25 03 2010 12 23 am kuhns john wrote i'd like use hibernate forms can't seem find any good examples o nline particular i'd like use my own configuration i can't see m find anything works makes sense i need use custom naming st rategy can anyone give me few pointers thanks john kuhns

click.apache.org_user_200908_6 hi prem templateexists context assets organizations id css styles.css parse context assets organizations id css styles.css end error message i am receiving expecting one whitespace string_literal true false integer_literal floating_point_literal identifier logical_not what styles.css since you parsing velocity template you need escape anything that's meant velocity code example header color ffffff should header color ffffff nothing all styles.css velocity code you should use include instead you won't have escape anything templateexists context assets organizations id css styles.css include context assets organizations id css styles.css end you can also assign path variable avoid repeating you wish set css context assets organizations id css styles.css templateexists css include css end hope helps cheers freddy

click.apache.org_user_200810_20 hi i'll answer your previous message minute 2008 10 19 bob schellink sabob1 gmail.com i've noticed you left comment about select accessing value directly instead using setvalue you referring select bindrequestvalue i think should changed invoke setvalue yes form.post can faked i thought best check value again getting only setting overridden setvalue method used check getvalue would needed illegal value could entered only advantage way done now exception thrown illegal value through bindrequestvalue only logged normally expected only happen runtime exceptions only thrown setters which mostly happen during developtime because developer passed illegal value well i think so cheers christopher ps underlying super method does use setvalue pps integerfield does override setvalue getvalue only makes certain get setinteger valid returns null illegal value maybe i'm being too paranoid maybe i should also leave set get value alone you want certainty about content you can use get setboolean get setinteger

click.apache.org_user_200909_1 hi reason constructor page does call processpagerequestparams clickservlet did request parameters would assigned bindable public fields page subclasses would available constructors page subclasses drawback initial values bindable fields override request parameters public class mypage extends page bindable public string param1 bindable public string param2 default public class mypage here param1 have value from request param2 always default current call processpagerequestparams clickservlet.initpage kept correct value set available oninit so could made backward compatible perhaps processpagerequestparams method could made available explicit call public class mypage getcontext processpagerequestparams here both param1 param2 have values from request regards finn

click.apache.org_user_200909_16 hi tim i haven't tried myself its actually quite difficult dynamically create controls pages because typically you need all controls process request adding controls after process stage means added controls don't participate processing i have built quite few pages which have tabbedpanel inside panel dynamic form which has different controls depending upon some context i have been using stateful pages make easier do introduces other problems when you try add new control stateful page has already been added fixing up bugs can real pain regards malcolm edgar fri sep 11 2009 5 36 am tim hooper thooper1 gmail.com wrote way dynamically add new tabs tabbed form example i've tried many approaches can't get work also i'd like dynamically add fields each tab sheet haven't gotten work either thanks tim

click.apache.org_user_201004_61 hi mike 27 04 2010 07 26 mgargano escholar.com wrote i'm trying integrate cayenne new click project i'm working i have few questions i have datacontextfilter from extras configured my web.xml how does work cayennetemplate from extras looks like datacontextfilter storing data context user's session whereas cayennetemplate storing thread local datacontextfilter always binds datacontext current thread whether request session scoped see line datacontextfilter bind datacontext request thread basecontext.bindthreadobjectcontext datacontext mutually exclusive yes although you might want customize cayennetemplate getdatacontext method your specific environment binding datacontext current thread well suited web applications where multiple requests handed off each thread swing based application another strategy might better suited also i need create some utilities run outside web application server also access same tables db because i wanted break out my cayenne db access stuff common library i'm using cayennetemplate base my dao's won't fly utility programs i looked source cayennetemplate didn't see any web specific code all stuff from click meant only web use i don't see any issue you include click extras.jar utility program use cayennetemplate base your daos alternatively you can copy paste cayennetemplate your utility program customize further you can include your utility jar inside web application use your custom cayennetemplate base service kind regards bob
